title: How can AR help in remote fieldwork?
problem: Field teams needed a way to visualize underground drill data without reliable internet and in harsh outdoor conditions.
solution: I designed an AR app with GPS-based overlays, offline support, and a high-contrast UI tailored for one-handed use outdoors.

title: How can mobile users easily personalize products?
problem: Mobile shoppers struggled to upload and position images when customizing products.
solution: I developed a responsive HTML5 Canvas tool for uploading, zooming, and previewing designs in real time on various products.

title: How can we make software easier for senior care staff?
problem: Staff at senior living communities found the software difficult to use across devices, slowing their workflow.
solution: I conducted field interviews and usability tests, then simplified workflows and UI layouts for more intuitive use on desktop, tablet, and mobile.

title: How can we make medical content more engaging?
problem: Static learning materials made it hard for students to stay focused and retain information.
solution: I created Lottie animations and illustrations to bring the content to life and improve learning on web and mobile platforms.
